charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1101_0100:
Kieran and [Name:PlayerNickname ] had
just finished a Pokémon battle...
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_0200:
That was a good battle! You sure are
strong, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_0300:
Wowzers! It sure is neat to always be able
to battle such strong Trainers!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_0400:
Pasio is great! And it’s not just the battles.
There are all kinds of people and things
here, and every day is so much fun!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_0500:
At the school I go to in Unova—Blueberry
Academy—it’s just the students and
the staff...
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_0600:
and there aren’t many people in my
hometown, Kitakami.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_0700:
Y’know...sometimes I miss how laid-back
things are in Kitakami.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_0401_0900: It has a lot of nature, and it’s super relaxed.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_0302_1000: Is there a lot of nature there?
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_0402_1100:
Yeah! There are mountains and rivers and
so much greenery!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_1200:
There aren’t many attractions like there are
here on Pasio, but it’s quiet and relaxing.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_1300:
I think you’d like it too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_1400:
If you ever visit Kitakami, I’ll show
you around!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_1500:
It’d be good to go during the Festival
of Masks.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_1600:
The candy apples they sell at the stalls are
amazing!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_1700:
Y’know, before evolving, Hydrapple was just
a cute little Dipplin and looked like a candy
apple.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_1800:
Back then, I knew almost nothing about
being a Trainer, but we both grew a lot
together.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_1900:
Even now, though, Hydrapple can be a
bit moody at times.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2000:
There are seven syrpents living inside its
apple, and they’ve all got a mind of
their own.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2100:
But when the time comes, their feelings
come together as one to really unleash
some power!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2200:
I also really depended on Hydrapple at the
academy. I couldn’t ask for a better partner!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2400:
There was a time when I tried to get
stronger all on my own. It caused a lot of
problems for everyone around me.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2500:
That’s when I realized there’s only so much
one can do alone.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2600:
When you’ve got problems or you’re going
through some stuff, if you work hard at it
with friends, you’ll probably be OK.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2700:
It’s important to have someone you can
depend on.
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2800:
So...I hope you can be there to lend me a
hand, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0357_00_suguri/2301_1201_2900:
There’s still a lot I don’t know about Pasio,
so I’d love it if you could teach me!
